description:
Whether you’re running 25K or bushwhacking on an overgrown route, these lightweight endurance shorts keep you comfortable. The built-in liner helps prevent chafing and wicks moisture. Side slits and a 6in. inseam let you stride freely.Soft, breathable shell fabric (91% recycled polyester and 9% spandex) moves with you and resists snagging.DWR finish sheds rain and splashes so they won't weigh you down.Moisture-wicking built-in polyester lining resists chafing, and Polygiene odour control treatment keeps it smelling fresh.Flat-knit waistband and drawcord ensure a comfortable fit.Side vents and 6in. inseam allow easy range of motion.Zippered rear pocket keeps your essentials secure.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade
name: Patagonia Nine Trails 6" Shorts - Women's
